item.description:
Hi Trailblazers and friends, come join us at the Historic Scenic Theater in Rochester as we meet each other and discuss "Flashmop' We will be practicing on stage and hopefully at the end of the day go out and practice what we have learned! There will be more to come! We will be joined by other meetup groups! We will be having a potlluck dinner so bring something to share.

If you're not sure what a flashmob is then now is the time to learn. It's a cultural trend spreading via the internet.

Check out this video of a flashmob done in Grand Central...
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jwMj3PJDxuo

A flash mob is a large group of people who assemble suddenly in a public place, perform an unusual action for a brief time, then quickly disperse.

Flashmobs are a fun way to take your humor, social, and theatrical skills and put them to the test, and a great way to make friends too! Join and come to one of our meetings, or simply contact any of the organizers for information.

If you have any more questions please don't hesitate to contact me at:603-312-6735
item.why: A flash mob is a large group of people who assemble suddenly in a public place, perform an unusual action for a brief time, then quickly disperse

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Flashmob Party / Meeting
